original_text: And the rest of it Aaron and his sons shall eat. It shall be eaten unleavened in a holy place. In the court of the tent of meeting they shall eat it.
korean_text: 그 나머지는 아론과 그의 자손이 먹되 누룩을 넣지 말고 거룩한 곳 회막 뜰에서 먹을지니라

sentences.original_text: And the rest of it Aaron and his sons shall eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나머지는 아론과 그의 아들들이 먹을지니라.

sentences.original_text: It shall be eaten unleavened in a holy place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 거룩한 곳에서 누룩 없이 먹을 것이며.

sentences.original_text: In the court of the tent of meeting they shall eat it.
